sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含事物或人的"外表，容貌"之意。
means: appearance ：普通用词，着重由总体产生的印象。
look ：普通用词，多用复数，可与appearance换用，但较口语化。
aspect ：书面用词，突出人或事物在某特定时间或地点时的外貌。

word_mean: 表象，形，状：一个物质或实体的特征性可见现象

sentence.Network_en: Marilyn made her last public appearance at Madison Square Garden.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛丽莲最后一次公开亮相是在麦迪逊广场花园。

sentence.Network_en: It was the president's second public appearance to date.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是总统到那时为止的第二次公开露面。

sentence.Network_en: The privations of monastery life were evident in his appearance.
sentence.Network_cn: 从他的外表来看可以明显看出修道院生活的清贫。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大英语B级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... appear vi. 出现,看来 appearance n. 出现,外貌 appetite n. 胃口,欲望.
2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... appear vi. 出现 appearance n. 出现，露面； 容貌 appendix n. 附录，阑尾.
新概念英语单词大全_百度文库 ... appeal vi. 有吸引力 appearance n. 露面，出场 appoint vt. 任命.
稿_百度百科 ... 通“槁”。干枯[ withered stalk] 样子；模样[ appearance；look] 叙说；论辈分。用同“搞”[ talk].

list.abs: 词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Disappear 消失 Appear 出现 Impolite 无礼貌的.
2012英语四级词汇复习资料_百度文库 ... appeal vi.&n. 呼吁；申述 appear vi. 出现；来到；似乎 appearance n. 出现，来到；外观.

jx.jx_en_mean: maintain an impression of wealth or well-being, especially to hide the true situation
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指为了掩饰真实情况而）维持门面，装门面，装体面

jx.jx_en_mean: attend an event briefly, especially as a matter of courtesy
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指出于礼节而）短时间到场，露面，亮相

jx.jx_en_mean: as far as can be seen
jx.jx_cn_mean: 就表面看来，就所能看到的情况而言

lj.lj_ly: to all appearances, it had been a normal day.
lj.lj_ls: 表面上看，那是平常的一天。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French aparance, aparence, from late Latin apparentia, from Latin apparere (see appear)

entry.def: When someone makes an appearance at a public event or in a broadcast, they take part in it.

example.ex: It was the president's second public appearance to date...
example.tran: 这是总统到那时为止的第二次公开露面。

example.ex: Keegan made 68 appearances in two seasons for Southampton, scoring 37 times.
example.tran: 基冈为南安普敦队踢了两个赛季，共上场68次，进球37个。

entry.def: Someone's or something's appearance is the way that they look.

example.ex: She used to be so fussy about her appearance...
example.tran: 她过去非常在意自己的容貌。

example.ex: He had the appearance of a college student...
example.tran: 他的模样就像个大学生。

entry.def: The appearance of someone or something in a place is their arrival there, especially when it is unexpected.

example.ex: The sudden appearance of a few bags of rice could start a riot.
example.tran: 突然出现几袋大米可能会引起骚乱。

example.ex: ...last Christmas, when there'd been the welcome appearance of Cousin Fred.
example.tran: 去年圣诞，堂兄弗雷德的现身受到热烈欢迎。

entry.def: The appearance of something new is its coming into existence or use.

example.ex: Flowering plants were making their first appearance, but were still a rarity...
example.tran: 显花植物开始出现了，但仍然很少。

example.ex: Fears are growing of a cholera outbreak following the appearance of a number of cases in the city.
example.tran: 该市出现几起霍乱病例之后，人们对霍乱爆发的恐惧越来越强烈。

entry.def: If something has the appearance of a quality, it seems to have that quality.

example.ex: We tried to meet both children's needs without the appearance of favoritism or unfairness...
example.tran: 我们尽力对两个孩子的需要都予以满足，而不显得有所偏向或袒护。

example.ex: The US president risked giving the appearance that the US was taking sides.
example.tran: 美国总统冒险作出美国正在摆明立场的姿态。

entry.def: If something is true to all appearances ,from all appearances, or by all appearances, it seems from what you observe or know about it that it is true.

example.ex: He was a small and to all appearances an unassuming man.
example.tran: 他个子小，看上去不事张扬。

entry.tran: 装样子；撑场面；打肿脸充胖子
entry.def: If you keep up appearances, you try to behave and dress in a way that people expect of you, even if you can no longer afford it.

example.ex: His parents' obsession with keeping up appearances haunted his childhood.
example.tran: 父母过于爱面子的做法在他儿时一直困扰着他。

entry.tran: 露一下面;到场稍作停留
entry.def: If you put in an appearance at an event, you go to it for a short time although you may not really want to, but do not stay.

example.ex: You must put in an appearance, at least, or she'll think you're avoiding her.
example.tran: 至少，你必须露一下面，否则她会认为你在躲避她。

means.word_mean: 1. outward or visible aspect of a person or thing
2. the event of coming into sight
3. formal attendance (in court or at a hearing) of a party in an action

sentences.sentence: "I tried to describe his appearance to the police"

means.word_mean: 5. the act of appearing in public view;

sentences.sentence: "the rookie made a brief appearance in the first period"
"it was Bernhardt's last appearance in America"

means.word_mean: 6. pretending that something is the case in order to make a good impression;

auth_sentence.content: It had the most extraordinarily beautiful appearance to me.
auth_sentence.res_content: It had the most extraordinarily beautiful appearance to me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It had the most extraordinarily beautiful appearance to me.

auth_sentence.content: Their sixth appearance at Reading and Leeds, Hadouken!
auth_sentence.res_content: Their sixth appearance at Reading and Leeds, Hadouken!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their sixth appearance at Reading and Leeds, Hadouken!

auth_sentence.content: Sorry about the confusing appearance of the prior post.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sorry about the confusing appearance of the prior post.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sorry about the confusing appearance of the prior post.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接受,承诺,容忍,赞同,相信
stems_affixes.word_buile: accept接受,承诺+ance物品,性质,状况→n.接受,承诺,容忍,赞同,相信
allow允许+ance物品,性质,状况→宽容→津贴,补助

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出现,露面;外表;[在会议等]作短暂露面
stems_affixes.word_buile: appear出现+ance物品,性质,状况→n.出现,露面;外表;[在会议等]作短暂露面
apply应用+ance物品,性质,状况→appliance用具,器具
assist援助,帮助+ance物品,性质,状况→n.协助,援助,补助
bal+ance物品,性质,状况→n.天平 n.&v.秤,平衡
disturb扰乱,防碍+ance物品,性质,状况→n.动乱,骚乱,干扰
forbear忍受+ance物品,性质,状况→n.自制,忍耐
guide指导+ance物品,性质,状况→n.指导,领导
ignore不理,不顾,忽视+ance物品,性质,状况→ignorance无知,愚昧
persevere坚持+ance物品,性质,状况→n.坚持

stems_affixes.value_cn: 信任,信心,依靠,依靠的人或物
stems_affixes.word_buile: reli=rely依靠+ance物品,性质,状况→n.信任,信心,依靠,依靠的人或物
resemble[v.像,类似]+ance物品,性质,状况→n.相似,相似性[点,物]
venge惩罚+ance物品,性质,状况→n.报复,报仇,复仇
bal+ance物品,性质,状况→n.天平 n.&v.秤,平衡
allow允许+ance物品,性质,状况→宽容→津贴,补助

Sentence.sentence: He is careless about his appearance.

Major supermarkets, in meeting consumer expectations, will often reject entire crops of perfectly edible fruit and vegetables at the farm because they do not meet exacting marketing standards for their physical characteristics, such as size and appearance.
Perfectly eatable fruit and vegetable crops often fail to reach supermarkets due to their size or physical appearance
And he had a really nice appearance.

means.word_mean: 出现, 显露, 露面, 演出, 出庭

sentences.en: The sudden appearance of a policeman caused the thief to run away.
sentences.cn: 警察突然出现, 小偷就逃跑了。

sentences.en: She has made several television appearances recently.
sentences.cn: 她最近参加一些电视演出。

means.word_mean: 外观, 外貌, 外表

sentences.en: She was a young woman of good appearance.
sentences.cn: 她是一位年轻貌美的女子。

sentences.en: It had the appearance of an 18th century church.
sentences.cn: 它的外观像一座十八世纪的教堂。

jushi.english: She has made several television appearances recently.
jushi.chinese: 她最近参加一些电视演出。

jushi.english: It had the appearance of an 18th century church.
jushi.chinese: 它的外观像一座18世纪的教堂。
